Meet the Adventurers

Hi! We're Eric and Allison. We've sold everything we own, quit our day jobs and hit the road in search of adventure. We make daily vlogs of our travels on our YouTube channel.

Our goal is to show others how we make this lifestyle possible. From the financial struggle to hectic nature of day to day travels, you'll find it all right here.
